product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter - Medium
long_description: The medium Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
short_description: The medium Wasatch Powder Monkeys Cargo Box Adapter Kit makes popular cargo boxes from Yakima, Thule and Inno compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
